entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Minnedosa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
